revised_title: Comparing Electron Microscope and X-ray Observations on Collagen Fibers
tldr: This study compares electron microscope and X-ray observations on collagen fibers, finding good agreement between the two methods. The research focuses on the density fluctuations and fine structure of collagen, which has important implications for understanding the properties of connective tissues in vertebrates.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
